prompts.title: Boho Desert Spin

The Bohemian (Boho) Look: High Desert Winds

The Pose: An expressive, movement-based pose. The model is spinning slowly, arms extended wide towards the sky to catch the wind in the fabric of the duster. Head is thrown back, eyes closed towards the sun.
​Prompt: Ultra-detailed 4K vertical fashion shot. Boho unisex style in a desert landscape at sunset. The model is caught mid-spin, arms outstretched to the sky, head thrown back, letting the wind billow a floor-length patterned silk duster kimono featuring Caribbean Green (#06d6a0), Sunglow Yellow (#ffd166), and Paradise Pink (#ef476f).
